scripts.LISKOV: npx tsc src/LISKOV/main.ts --outDir src/LISKOV/dist && node src/LISKOV/dist/main.js
scripts.tarefa-4: npx tsc tarefa-4/main.ts --outDir tarefa-4/dist && node tarefa-4/dist/main.js
scripts.tarefa-5: npx tsc tarefa-5/main.ts --outDir tarefa-5/dist && node tarefa-5/dist/main.js
